term.title: mucopolysaccharides

item.text: Polysaccharides composed of alternating units from uronic acids and glycosamines, and commonly partially esterified with sulfuric acid.

sources.item: PAC, 1995, 67, 1307. 'Glossary of class names of organic compounds and reactivity intermediates based on structure (IUPAC Recommendations 1995)' on page 1350 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199567081307)
